verbose_text: An in vivo study reported that the combination of donepezil and memantine decreased clearance of memantine and hence increased its blood concentration and its area under the curve.14 However, no significant pharmacokinetic interaction was observed in a co-administration study of donepezil and memantine conducted on healthy human subjects.15 Moreover, meta-analyses have also investigated the combined efficacy and safety of donepezil and memantine for Alzheimer-type dementia.16 Currently, the effect of the combination of memantine and donepezil is not considered a clinical problem.
